title: CRASH
body:
When im going to watch a game or im going to play a game, before players load, RIOT send me a mail that im crashing and the tell me to right them what happened before the crash message. This is happening last 2 days.Maybe this affect that last week I connected my PC with a Monitor TV and the resolution was very bad, I changed the graphics from normal (1366x768) into 2048xsmthing (dont remember) and then the screen in Monitor TV zoomed in very much and the screen was shaking right and left and i couldnt fix the settings again and now I put back my old screen, RIOT send me this message. Could you help me immediately?
Thank you for your time!

replies.body: It sounds like you are having bugsplat errors, which can happen if your game is failing to render properly.  As a first step, I recommend swapping to smaller resolution especially if you are using 4K which we don't currently support.  You should also check out our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune up any drivers or files that might be causing this crash.  Hope that helps!
